summary: A group of four teenage friends become trapped in a Mexican border tunnel where they fall prey, one-by one, to tortured ghosts who haunt it.
cast: Edward Furlong|Steve Railsback|Cerina Vincent|Amber Benson|Callard Harris|Paul Cram|Alejandro Samaniego|Dean N. Arevalo|Eric Caselton|Josef Geiger|Richard Miranda|Michael Latt|Serina Latt|Adam Gobble|Dominic Ceci|Michel Dozois|Darien Rubino|Jillian Rubinio|Zach Weiner|Payton Wright-Ferguson|Sydney Wright-Ferguson|Colin Vais
title: Intermedio
